rubrics.rubric: Neck pain with stiffness < morning or after rest
rubrics.modality: Worse after rest, better gentle motion

rubrics.rubric: Neck pain < damp weather, < cold, > heat
rubrics.notes: Seen in chronic spondylotic cases with weather sensitivity

rubrics.rubric: Cervical pain with vertigo on neck movement
rubrics.notes: Indicates vascular or neural impingement in cervical region

rubrics.rubric: Neck pain radiating to shoulder or upper arm without tingling
rubrics.notes: Cervical disc involvement but not true neuralgia

rubrics.rubric: Lumbar pain < bending, < lifting, > lying on hard surface
rubrics.modality: < flexion, > firm support or lying still
rubrics.notes: Degenerative lumbar spine with mechanical strain

rubrics.rubric: Back pain < rising from chair, > walking slowly
rubrics.notes: Lumbosacral spondylosis early or moderate stage

rubrics.rubric: Stiffness and cracking in spine on movement
Pain in spine < long standing, > lying with pillow support
rubrics.modality: Mid-back or lumbar region pain worsens with standing long
rubrics.notes: Postural fatigue or intervertebral spacing issue

rubrics.rubric: Chronic spinal stiffness and pain after suppression (steroids, neck collar, ointments)
rubrics.modality: Symptoms shifted deeper after superficial relief
rubrics.notes: Important when skin/respiratory complaints were treated topically

rubrics.rubric: Marked degeneration of cervical/lumbar spine with bone changes or calcification
rubrics.modality: With crepitus, fusion, or spur formation
rubrics.notes: Late-stage spinal spondylosis or ankylosing signs

rubrics.rubric: Spinal pain < cold damp weather with suppressed eruption history
Chronic cervical or lumbar pain after emotional suppression, grief or exhaustion
rubrics.modality: Back pain appears after trauma or grief
rubrics.notes: Psychosomatic trigger in chronic back dysfunction

rubrics.rubric: Recurrent spinal pain in patient with family history of arthritis or tuberculosis
rubrics.modality: Degenerative or spinal disc issues in genetic terrain
rubrics.notes: Deep constitutional miasm affecting long spine

rubrics.rubric: Back pain after injury, strain, or fracture history not responding to acute remedies
